alert.note: Alert for Pima; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 9:33PM MST until August 06 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MST FOR EASTERN PIMA AND NORTHEASTERN SANTA CRUZ COUNTIES... At 932 PM MST, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located across the Tucson Metro area extending from Green Valley northward to Tucson, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Green Valley, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, Tanque Verde, Vail, South Tucson, Three Points, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, East Sahuarita, Sonoita, Elgin, Sabino Canyon Recreation Area, Summit, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West and Valencia West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
